parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description. The description can be up to 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: IpControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACL. The ID is unique.

parameters.name: IpControlName
parameters.description: The name of the ACL. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with an underscore (\_).
